title: The 'Rani' Diamond and Ruby Pendant Haar
materials: surrounded by brilliant-cut Diamonds. Diamonds are estimated to be VS clarity and G color. Finished with a Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.

The setting showcases a delicate pave setting for maximum sparkle.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold complements the intense Ruby red. The sparkling white Diamonds create a striking contrast.
occasions: and milestone anniversaries. Its modern design also allows for sophisticated evening wear
making it suitable for cocktail parties and black-tie events. Makes a stunning statement piece for a bride during her reception or 'Sangeet'.
